text:
@NightlyPolitics @MeidasTouch God must have mumbled when he whispered in the ear of @Mike_Pence. Nah, the @VP is just full of crap like @realDonaldTrump .
@SecondLady @FLOTUS COVID-19 IS A LONG, LONG WAY FROM OVER. NEW WH MOTTO "KILL AS MANY AS NECESSARY"
